alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 11:45PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda, northwestern Contra Costa and northeastern San Francisco Counties through 1215 AM PST... At 1144 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Berkeley, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Alameda, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette, El Cerrito, Hercules, Albany, Pinole, Orinda, Piedmont, Emeryville, Tara Hills, West Pittsburg, West Pittsburg Cdp and El Sobrante. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
